org.apache.spark.ml.param

Class Param<T>

  • Object
    • org.apache.spark.ml.param.Param<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BooleanParam, DoubleParam, FloatParam, IntParam, LongParam

    public class Param<T>
extends Object
implements scala.Serializable
    :: AlphaComponent :: A param with self-contained documentation and optionally default value. Primitive-typed param should use the specialized versions, which are more friendly to Java users.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
